OOC: In her present state, she can't help but look, but all she's 
seeing right now is the mental equivalent of coleslaw.  That doesn't 
tell her much.

Empath::

"Useless hunk of slag," Empath snarls, swatting Amperion in the 
head.  Then she raises her voice.  "Attenion, Maximals, I am here to 
talk!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: If she's a telepath this begs the question, why didn't she 
look?  :-P
> 
> ::Amperion::
>        He's sitting in front of the Maximal base staring aimlessly 
around 
> him.  "I've got Amperion, lallseday."  He begins repeating this 
phrase over 
> and over again not noticing Empath.
